name: Rufus Brevifolia
description:
--Fig 02--
Rufus Brevifolia is a Marsupial Embryophyte creature from Hiisi, an exoplanet located 2.3 million light years from Earth.
Rufus spends its life floating in clouds of Argon and also rooted in Lanthanum lands, where it gets all the nutrients it needs, as it is a non-hunting or feeding creature.
Despite his soft look, its body cover is harder than steel, so it keeps all his organs inside it. 
The species' individuals value patience and honesty as virtues, and they are very sentient beings, so they can telepath with one another in any part of its solar system.
